channel.title: üè¢ Xidian University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Xidian University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: E2E-MFD: Towards End-to-End Synchronous Multimodal Fusion Detection
item.description: E2E-MFD: A novel end-to-end multimodal fusion detection algorithm achieves state-of-the-art performance by synchronously optimizing image fusion and object detection.

item.title: Feature-Level Adversarial Attacks and Ranking Disruption for Visible-Infrared Person Re-identification
item.description: New feature-level adversarial attacks disrupt visible-infrared person re-identification (VIReID) systems by cleverly aligning and manipulating features to cause incorrect ranking results.

item.title: Peri-midFormer: Periodic Pyramid Transformer for Time Series Analysis
item.description: Peri-midFormer uses a novel periodic pyramid transformer to effectively model complex periodic variations in time series, achieving state-of-the-art results in forecasting, imputation, classification,…

item.title: Pretrained Optimization Model for Zero-Shot Black Box Optimization
item.description: Pretrained Optimization Model (POM) excels at zero-shot black-box optimization, outperforming existing methods, especially in high dimensions, through direct application or few-shot fine-tuning.

item.title: SA3DIP: Segment Any 3D Instance with Potential 3D Priors
item.description: SA3DIP boosts 3D instance segmentation accuracy by cleverly using 3D spatial and textural cues alongside 2D multi-view masks, overcoming limitations of previous methods.

item.title: Satformer: Accurate and Robust Traffic Data Estimation for Satellite Networks
item.description: Satformer: a novel neural network accurately estimates satellite network traffic using an adaptive sparse spatio-temporal attention mechanism, outperforming existing methods.
